channel.title: Help im new and know absolutley nothing
channel.description: ok so im trying to make my own private server because the moparscape 3.1 has so many glitches. so every time i click on run&compile, it says like "javac is not recognized as an internal external or batch program" and i tried different codes, and i downloaded the latest version of the java download kit or what ever it's called. but it doesnt work please help. if you could, please tell me the basic codes i need like, where to spawn when you first start, make your own skill, and such. please help i know almost nothing about about java coding (i got confused with the behaviors of objects.) so please help me.

item.title: Help im new and know absolutley nothing
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

go 2 your compiler right click it and hit edit

then delete everything in it and replace it with

@echo off
COLOR 08
title ENTERSERVERNAMEHERE Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

that should help you if you need further help, My msn is i_r_ryan_k@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: Help im new and know absolutley nothing

item.title: Help im new and know absolutley nothing
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

if it still syas javac ect… edit your compiler with these steps…

ok go to your compiler, and edit it to say this…

@echo off
title Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javacSCAMSCAMSCAMSCAMSC AM” *.java
title Compiling done.
pause

ok, now thisll only work if you have jdk update 8 if you have 9 change the 8 to a 9, www.java.com if you dont have either…

ok now if it hasnt worked yet it will say somethign along the lines of classcannot be found…ect…

follow these steps…

1.go to start
2.right click my computer
3.click properties
4.click advanced
5.click variables
6.click add and add this::

CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

Read full topic
